review: Foradil Aerolizer (formoterol):I have been on foradil for years, and have had to find a new replacement as it doesn't seem available any longer.
Perforomist (formoterol):My COPD is remarkedably better. I can breath much better.  However, I also have 7 side effects.
Foradil Aerolizer (formoterol):I've been using Foradil for 3 months and am very pleased with the results. I was using my Proventil every 3-4 hours. Now I use my inhaler maybe once a day.

Foradil Aerolizer (formoterol):This medicine has been a true miracle for me.  I was on multiple medications, oxygen most of the day and night, and taking several nebulizing treatments a day.  Have been on Foradil for two months and only use oxygen when I go to sleep at night, only take 3 nebulizing treatments a day, and have gotten off two of medications completely.  I breathe better and feel better than I have in several years.  I wish I had been given this medication much sooner.  It is truly amazing the difference in the quality of my life that this medication has given me.
Perforomist (formoterol):I have used this for about 2 years and it sure beats any of the others that I have used.
